detectors.description: AdvanceToken (../../../Desktop/mainnet/02/0240a41a931a97b5360c0be928a4eadda219bf86_AdvanceToken.sol#186-257) has incorrect ERC20 function interface:BaseToken.transfer(address,uint256) (../../../Desktop/mainnet/02/0240a41a931a97b5360c0be928a4eadda219bf86_AdvanceToken.sol#153-155)

owned.transferOwnership(address) (../../../Desktop/mainnet/02/0240a41a931a97b5360c0be928a4eadda219bf86_AdvanceToken.sol#49-51) should emit an event for: 
	- owner = newOwner (../../../Desktop/mainnet/02/0240a41a931a97b5360c0be928a4eadda219bf86_AdvanceToken.sol#50) 
	- owner = newOwner (../../../Desktop/mainnet/02/0240a41a931a97b5360c0be928a4eadda219bf86_AdvanceToken.sol#50)

owned.transferOwnership(address).newOwner (../../../Desktop/mainnet/02/0240a41a931a97b5360c0be928a4eadda219bf86_AdvanceToken.sol#49) lacks a zero-check on :
		- owner = newOwner (../../../Desktop/mainnet/02/0240a41a931a97b5360c0be928a4eadda219bf86_AdvanceToken.sol#50)

AdvanceToken.isFrozen(address) (../../../Desktop/mainnet/02/0240a41a931a97b5360c0be928a4eadda219bf86_AdvanceToken.sol#224-232) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- frozenTime[target].startTime <= now && now <= frozenTime[target].endTime (../../../Desktop/mainnet/02/0240a41a931a97b5360c0be928a4eadda219bf86_AdvanceToken.sol#228)
detectors.markdown:
[AdvanceToken.isFrozen(address)](../../../Desktop/mainnet/02/0240a41a931a97b5360c0be928a4eadda219bf86_AdvanceToken.sol#L224-L232) uses timestamp for comparisons
